item.arbiter_sword.description: §5The sword in my hand is the bright mirror that reflects the sky, the sorrow of all things is cut by me
the_arbiter.blueprint/arbiter_sword.mess: §uHear the end of the world hold this power
the_arbiter.blueprint/unknown.tooltip: May this body, bear your pain
the_arbiter.blueprint/unknown.message: Only the Creator knows his secret
the_arbiter.blueprint_anthology.title: Illustrations--Blueprint
the_arbiter.title: Blueprint Anthology
the_arbiter.author: §othe arbiter
the_arbiter.intro:
The twinkling stars once flowed above the Milky Way. People who claimed to exhaust all the mysteries of the world were also chasing the falling stars in the long river of time. Find those knowledge scattered in this world, they once shone in the distant past.
We will see you soon, I hope you won't stand on the opposite side of this world then.
the_arbiter.advancements.root.title: Hidden Gaze
the_arbiter.advancements.root.descriptio: Start the journey to find the fragments of wisdom
